replies.author: LCSDB
replies.txt_content:
有一种东西叫/kill，下面的指令可以毁灭天地(慎用)
 
/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~2 {Time:1,Block:"minecraft:redstone_block",Passengers:[{id:"FallingSand",Time:1,Block:"minecraft:activator_rail",Passengers:[{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~2 ~0 repeating_command_block 1 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/kill @e"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"/setblock ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:lava 15"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~ ~ ~ air 0"}]}]}复制代码
